import { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Store } from "../Store"; import { FaPlusCircle, FaMinusCircle, FaTrashAlt, FaHeart, } from "react-icons/fa"; const CartPage = () => { const { state, dispatch: ctxDispatch } = useContext(Store); const { cart: { cartItems }, } = state; const book = []; return (

Carrito

{cartItems.length === 0 ? (
No hay nada en el carro
) : (
{cartItems.map((item) => (
  • {" "} {item.titulo}
    {item.quantity}
    ${item.precio}
))}
)}
SubTotal ({cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.quantity,0)}{' '} items) : $ {cartItems.reduce((a,c) => a + c.precio * c.quantity, 0)}
Precio: $100
$1000 save 20%

Descripcion:

{book.descripcion}
{book.counInstock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Agotado )}
{/*

${book.precio}

*/} {/* */}
); }; export default CartPage;
